name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience, now transitioning into a Senior Sales Engineer role. Proficient in **AWS**, **Google Cloud Services**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes**, with strong problem-solving and presentation skills that enhance technical demonstrations and client engagements. Skilled in deploying applications on **Microsoft Windows Server** and **Linux** environments, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.

Expert in backend technologies including **JavaScript**, **Python**, and RESTful APIs, with a comprehensive understanding of database systems such as **MS SQL Server**, **Oracle**, and **PostgreSQL**. Proven ability to build high-performance applications for the healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept at aligning development solutions with compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS, leveraging AI/ML technologies for predictive analytics and automation.
